verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> by <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> Timotheus <WG5095> our brother <WG80>,

To the saints <WG40> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> brethren <WG80> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> which are at <WG1722> Colosse <WG2857>: Grace <WG5485> be unto you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> peace <WG1515>, from <WG575> God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.
We give thanks <WG2168> to God <WG2316> and <WG2532> the Father <WG3962> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, praying <WG4336> always <WG3842> for <WG4012> you <WG5216>,
Since we heard <WG191> of your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>, and <WG2532> of the love <WG26> which <WG3588> ye have to <WG1519> all <WG3956> the saints <WG40>,

For <WG1223> the hope <WG1680> which <WG3588> is laid up <WG606> for you <WG5213> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, whereof <WG3739> ye heard before <WG4257> in <WG1722> the word <WG3056> of the truth <WG225> of the gospel <WG2098>;

Which <WG3588> is come <WG3918> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>, as <WG2531> <WG2532> it is in <WG1722> all <WG3956> the world <WG2889>; and <WG2532> bringeth forth fruit <WG2076> <WG2592>, as <WG2531> it doth also <WG2532> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>, since <WG575> the <WG3739> day <WG2250> ye heard <WG191> of it, and <WG2532> knew <WG1921> the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> truth <WG225>:

As <WG2531> ye <WG3129> also <WG2532> learned <WG3129> of <WG575> Epaphras <WG1889> our <WG2257> dear <WG27> fellowservant <WG4889>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> for <WG5228> you <WG5216> a faithful <WG4103> minister <WG1249> of Christ <WG5547>;
Who <WG3588> also <WG2532> declared <WG1213> unto us <WG2254> your <WG5216> love <WG26> in <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>.

For <WG1223> this cause <WG5124> we <WG2249> also <WG2532>, since <WG575> the <WG3739> day <WG2250> we heard <WG191> it, do <WG3973> not <WG3756> cease <WG3973> to pray <WG4336> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> to desire <WG154> that <WG2443> ye might be filled <WG4137> with the knowledge <WG1922> of his <WG846> will <WG2307> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> wisdom <WG4678> and <WG2532> spiritual <WG4152> understanding <WG4907>;

That ye <WG5209> might walk <WG4043> worthy <WG516> of the Lord <WG2962> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> pleasing <WG699>, being fruitful <WG2592> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>, and <WG2532> increasing <WG837> in <WG1519> the knowledge <WG1922> of God <WG2316>;

Strengthened <WG1412> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> might <WG1411>, according to <WG2596> his <WG846> glorious <WG1391> power <WG2904>, unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> patience <WG5281> and <WG2532> longsuffering <WG3115> with <WG3326> joyfulness <WG5479>;

Giving thanks <WG2168> unto the Father <WG3962>, which <WG3588> hath made <WG2427> us <WG2248> meet <WG2427> to <WG1519> be partakers <WG3310> of the inheritance <WG2819> of the saints <WG40> in <WG1722> light <WG5457>:

Who <WG3739> hath delivered <WG4506> us <WG2248> from <WG1537> the power <WG1849> of darkness <WG4655>, and <WG2532> hath translated <WG3179> us into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of his <WG846> dear <WG26> Son <WG5207>:
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> we have <WG2192> redemption <WG629> through <WG1223> his <WG846> blood <WG129>, even the forgiveness <WG859> of sins <WG266>:
Who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the image <WG1504> of the invisible <WG517> God <WG2316>, the firstborn <WG4416> of every <WG3956> creature <WG2937>:

For <WG3754> by <WG1722> him <WG846> were <WG2936> all things <WG3956> created <WG2936>, that are in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> that are in <WG1909> earth <WG1093>, visible <WG3707> and <WG2532> invisible <WG517>, whether <WG1535> they be thrones <WG2362>, or <WG1535> dominions <WG2963>, or <WG1535> principalities <WG746>, or <WG1535> powers <WG1849>: all things <WG3956> were created <WG2936> by <WG1223> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> for <WG1519> him <WG846>:
And <WG2532> he <WG846> is <WG2076> before <WG4253> all things <WG3956>, and <WG2532> by <WG1722> him <WG846> all things <WG3956> consist <WG4921>.

And <WG2532> he <WG846> is <WG2076> the head <WG2776> of the body <WG4983>, the church <WG1577>: who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the beginning <WG746>, the firstborn <WG4416> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>; that <WG2443> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> things he <WG846> might have <WG1096> the preeminence <WG4409>.
For it pleased <WG2106> the Father that <WG3754> in <WG1722> him <WG846> should <WG2730> all <WG3956> fulness <WG4138> dwell <WG2730>;

And <WG2532>, having made peace <WG1517> through <WG1223> the blood <WG129> of his <WG846> cross <WG4716>, by <WG1223> him <WG846> to reconcile <WG604> all things <WG3956> unto <WG1519> himself <WG846>; by <WG1223> him <WG846>, I say, whether <WG1535> they be things in <WG1909> earth <WG1093>, or <WG1535> things in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

And <WG2532> you <WG5209>, that were <WG5607> sometime <WG4218> alienated <WG526> and <WG2532> enemies <WG2190> in your mind <WG1271> by <WG1722> wicked <WG4190> works <WG2041>, yet <WG1161> now <WG3570> hath he reconciled <WG604>

In <WG1722> the body <WG4983> of his <WG846> flesh <WG4561> through <WG1223> death <WG2288>, to present <WG3936> you <WG5209> holy <WG40> and <WG2532> unblameable <WG299> and <WG2532> unreproveable <WG410> in his <WG846> sight <WG2714>:

If <WG1489> ye continue <WG1961> in the faith <WG4102> grounded <WG2311> and <WG2532> settled <WG1476>, and <WG2532> be not <WG3361> moved away <WG3334> from <WG575> the hope <WG1680> of the gospel <WG2098>, which <WG3739> ye have heard <WG191>, and which <WG3588> was preached <WG2784> to <WG1722> every <WG3956> creature <WG2937> which is under <WG5259> heaven <WG3772>; whereof <WG3739> I <WG1473> Paul <WG3972> am made <WG1096> a minister <WG1249>;

Who <WG3739> now <WG3568> rejoice <WG5463> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> sufferings <WG3804> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> fill up <WG466> that which is behind <WG5303> of the afflictions <WG2347> of Christ <WG5547> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> flesh <WG4561> for <WG5228> his <WG846> body's <WG4983> sake <WG5228>, which is <WG3603> the church <WG1577>:

Whereof <WG3739> I <WG1473> am made <WG1096> a minister <WG1249>, according to <WG2596> the dispensation <WG3622> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> is given <WG1325> to me <WG3427> for <WG1519> you <WG5209>, to fulfil <WG4137> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316>;

Even the mystery <WG3466> which <WG3588> hath been hid <WG613> from <WG575> ages <WG165> and <WG2532> from <WG575> generations <WG1074>, but <WG1161> now <WG3570> is made manifest <WG5319> to his <WG846> saints <WG40>:

To whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> would <WG2309> make known <WG1107> what <WG5101> is the riches <WG4149> of the glory <WG1391> of this <WG5127> mystery <WG3466> among <WG1722> the Gentiles <WG1484>; which <WG3739> is <WG2076> Christ <WG5547> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>, the hope <WG1680> of glory <WG1391>:

Whom <WG3739> we <WG2249> preach <WG2605>, warning <WG3560> every <WG3956> man <WG444>, and <WG2532> teaching <WG1321> every <WG3956> man <WG444> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> wisdom <WG4678>; that <WG2443> we may present <WG3936> every <WG3956> man <WG444> perfect <WG5046> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>:

Whereunto <WG1519> <WG3739> I <WG2872> also <WG2532> labour <WG2872>, striving <WG75> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> working <WG1753>, which <WG3588> worketh <WG1754> in <WG1722> me <WG1698> mightily <WG1722> <WG1411>.
